text: I want to build a Workflow Integration and list it on the App Marketplace. Should I reference the <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/workflow-extensions/workflow-extensions-overview|Legacy Workflow Extensions docs>, the (what appears to be newer) <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|Custom Workflow Actions docs> (or some other resource) for dev guidance?
You'll want to use the Custom workflow action docs
